comments.author: owen atkins

comments.text:
What science is this all based on? For instance: why would refrigeration 
cause moldiness to start? I don't think people understand how mold 
starts...refrigeration will retard mold growth, not increase it.

Sure you can be mad about this (these kind of videos/articles spread have a 
tendency to do that), but refrigeration causes food to last longer because 
it retards the growth of microbes. Some of these reasons for not 
refrigerating your food are a bit..ridiculous.﻿
